name: Pizza
instructions:
1)Microwave the muzzarela and the cream cheese for 1 minute
2)Add and mix it salt and almond flour
3)Add and mix the rest of the ingredients
4)Roll out the dough between two sheets of parchment paper
5)Poke the dough with a fork
6)Bake it at 390F for 15 minutes
7)Remove and flip the crust
8)Add your favorite toppings

Note: the macronutrients refer to the crust only
additionalInfo: Missing your pizza?? Try this recipe: It is loved even those who are not in Keto. This recipe was adapted from HeadBangers Kitchen.
